name: Nebular Crush
description:
A mysterious virus has corrupted the Cyberverse and now Wizzy the Wizard needs your help to destroy it!
Armed with a magical surfboard and guitar, you must surf and shred your way to victory through over 50 action-packed levels in this retro arcade shooter.

Features:


  • Classic retro arcade action.
  • Surf with a friend in local co-op multiplayer.
  • Over 50 levels.
  • Explorable world map.
  • Dozens of unique enemies to blast.
  • Unlock awesome powerups.
  • Weird trippy graphics.
  • It's really difficult!
